'''By Cinder City's Glowing Light''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for By Cinder City's Glowing Light is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Soulblaze|Soulblaze Battle Pass]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
